00041 class negativeKTA : public ErrorFunction

00057         double error(Model& model, const Array<double>& input, const Array<double>& target)
00058         {
00059                 // check the model type
00060                 C_SVM* pCSVM = dynamic_cast<C_SVM*>(&model);
00061                 KernelFunction* pKernel = dynamic_cast<KernelFunction*>(&model);
00062                 bool norm2 = false;
00063                 if (pCSVM != NULL)
00064                 {
00065                         if (! pCSVM->is2norm()) throw "[negativeKTA::error] C_SVM does not use 2-norm slack penalty.";
00066                         pKernel = pCSVM->getSVM()->getKernel();
00067                         norm2 = true;
00068                 }
00069                 else if (pKernel == NULL) throw "[negativeKTA::error] model is not a valid C_SVM or KernelFunction.";
00070 
00071                 int i, j, T = input.dim(0);
00072                 double k;
00073                 double A = 0.0;
00074                 double S = 0.0;
00075                 for (i=0; i<T; i++)
00076                 {
00077                         for (j=0; j<i; j++)
00078                         {
00079                                 k = pKernel->eval(input[i], input[j]);
00080                                 A += 2.0 * target(i) * target(j) * k;
00081                                 S += 2.0 * k * k;
00082                         }
00083                         k = pKernel->eval(input[i], input[i]);
00084                         if (norm2) k += (target(i) > 0.0) ? 1.0 / pCSVM->get_Cplus() : 1.0 / pCSVM->get_Cminus();
00085                         A += k;
00086                         S += k * k;
00087                 }
00088                 return -A / (T * sqrt(S));
00089         }

00095         double errorDerivative(Model& model, const Array<double>& input, const Array<double>& target, Array<double>& derivative)
00096         {
00097                 // check the model type
00098                 C_SVM* pCSVM = dynamic_cast<C_SVM*>(&model);
00099                 KernelFunction* pKernel = dynamic_cast<KernelFunction*>(&model);
00100                 bool norm2 = false;
00101                 if (pCSVM != NULL)
00102                 {
00103                         if (! pCSVM->is2norm()) throw "[negativeKTA::errorDerivative] C_SVM does not use 2-norm slack penalty.";
00104                         pKernel = pCSVM->getSVM()->getKernel();
00105                         norm2 = true;
00106                 }
00107                 else if (pKernel == NULL) throw "[negativeKTA::errorDerivative] model is not a valid C_SVM or KernelFunction.";
00108 
00109                 int i, j, T = input.dim(0);
00110                 int d, D = model.getParameterDimension();
00111                 double k;
00112                 double A = 0.0;
00113                 double S = 0.0;
00114                 double yy;
00115                 Array<double> a(D);
00116                 Array<double> b(D);
00117                 Array<double> der(D);
00118                 derivative.resize(D, false);
00119 
00120                 a = 0.0;
00121                 b = 0.0;
00122                 double aCplus = 0.0;
00123                 double aCminus = 0.0;
00124                 double bCplus = 0.0;
00125                 double bCminus = 0.0;
00126                 derivative = 0.0;
00127 
00128                 for (i=0; i<T; i++)
00129                 {
00130                         for (j=0; j<i; j++)
00131                         {
00132                                 k = pKernel->evalDerivative(input[i], input[j], der);
00133                                 yy = target(i) * target(j);
00134                                 for (d=0; d<D; d++)
00135                                 {
00136                                         a(d) += 2.0 * yy * der(d);
00137                                         b(d) += 2.0 * k * der(d);
00138                                 }
00139                                 A += 2.0 * yy * k;
00140                                 S += 2.0 * k * k;
00141                         }
00142                         k = pKernel->evalDerivative(input[i], input[i], der);
00143                         if (norm2)
00144                         {
00145                                 if (target(i) > 0.0)
00146                                 {
00147                                         double invC = 1.0 / pCSVM->get_Cplus();
00148                                         k += invC;
00149                                         aCplus -= invC * invC;
00150                                         bCplus -= k * invC * invC;
00151                                 }
00152                                 else
00153                                 {
00154                                         double invC = 1.0 / pCSVM->get_Cminus();
00155                                         k += invC;
00156                                         aCminus -= invC * invC;
00157                                         bCminus -= k * invC * invC;
00158                                 }
00159                         }
00160                         for (d=0; d<D; d++)
00161                         {
00162                                 a(d) += der(d);
00163                                 b(d) += k * der(d);
00164                         }
00165                         A += k;
00166                         S += k * k;
00167                 }
00168 
00169                 double N = T * sqrt(S);
00170                 for (d=0; d<D; d++)
00171                 {
00172                         derivative(d + 1) = (A * b(d) / S - a(d)) / N;
00173                 }
00174                 if (norm2)
00175                 {
00176                         double cr = pCSVM->getCRatio();
00177                         derivative(0) = (A * (bCplus + cr * bCminus) / S - (aCplus + cr * aCminus)) / N;
00178                 }
00179                 else derivative(0) = 0.0;
00180 
00181                 return -A / N;
00182         }
00183 };

00219 class negativeBKTA : public ErrorFunction

00235         double error(Model& model, const Array<double>& input, const Array<double>& target)
00236         {
00237                 // check the model type
00238                 C_SVM* pCSVM = dynamic_cast<C_SVM*>(&model);
00239                 KernelFunction* pKernel = dynamic_cast<KernelFunction*>(&model);
00240                 bool norm2 = false;
00241                 if (pCSVM != NULL)
00242                 {
00243                         if (! pCSVM->is2norm()) throw "[negativeBKTA::error] C_SVM does not use 2-norm slack penalty.";
00244                         pKernel = pCSVM->getSVM()->getKernel();
00245                         norm2 = true;
00246                 }
00247                 else if (pKernel == NULL) throw "[negativeBKTA::error] model is not a valid C_SVM or KernelFunction.";
00248 
00249                 int i, j, T = input.dim(0);
00250 
00251                 int n = 0;
00252                 int p = 0;
00253                 double mult_pp, mult_nn;
00254                 for (i=0; i<T; i++) if (target(i) > 0.0) p++; else n++;
00255                 mult_pp = ((double)n) / ((double)p);
00256                 mult_nn = ((double)p) / ((double)n);
00257 
00258                 double k, temp;
00259                 double A = 0.0;
00260                 double S = 0.0;
00261                 for (i=0; i<T; i++)
00262                 {
00263                         for (j=0; j<i; j++)
00264                         {
00265                                 k = pKernel->eval(input[i], input[j]);
00266                                 if (target(i) > 0.0 && target(j) > 0.0)
00267                                 {
00268                                         temp = 2.0 * mult_pp * k;
00269                                         A += temp;
00270                                         S += temp * k;
00271                                 }
00272                                 else if (target(i) < 0.0 && target(j) < 0.0)
00273                                 {
00274                                         temp = 2.0 * mult_nn * k;
00275                                         A += temp;
00276                                         S += temp * k;
00277                                 }
00278                                 else
00279                                 {
00280                                         temp = 2.0 * k;
00281                                         A -= temp;
00282                                         S += temp * k;
00283                                 }
00284                         }
00285                         k = pKernel->eval(input[i], input[i]);
00286                         if (norm2) k += (target(i) > 0.0) ? 1.0 / pCSVM->get_Cplus() : 1.0 / pCSVM->get_Cminus();
00287                         if (target(i) > 0.0)
00288                         {
00289                                 temp = mult_pp * k;
00290                                 A += temp;
00291                                 S += temp * k;
00292                         }
00293                         else
00294                         {
00295                                 temp = mult_nn * k;
00296                                 A += temp;
00297                                 S += temp * k;
00298                         }
00299                 }
00300                 return -0.5 * A / (sqrt(S * ((double)p) * ((double)n)));
00301         }

00307         double errorDerivative(Model& model, const Array<double>& input, const Array<double>& target, Array<double>& derivative)
00308         {
00309                 // check the model type
00310                 C_SVM* pCSVM = dynamic_cast<C_SVM*>(&model);
00311                 KernelFunction* pKernel = dynamic_cast<KernelFunction*>(&model);
00312                 bool norm2 = false;
00313                 if (pCSVM != NULL)
00314                 {
00315                         if (! pCSVM->is2norm()) throw "[negativeBKTA::errorDerivative] C_SVM does not use 2-norm slack penalty.";
00316                         pKernel = pCSVM->getSVM()->getKernel();
00317                         norm2 = true;
00318                 }
00319                 else if (pKernel == NULL) throw "[negativeBKTA::errorDerivative] model is not a valid C_SVM or KernelFunction.";
00320 
00321                 int i, j, T = input.dim(0);
00322 
00323                 int n = 0;
00324                 int p = 0;
00325                 double mult, amult, mult_pp, mult_nn;
00326                 for (i=0; i<T; i++) if (target(i) > 0.0) p++; else n++;
00327                 mult_pp = ((double)n) / ((double)p);
00328                 mult_nn = ((double)p) / ((double)n);
00329 
00330                 int d, D = model.getParameterDimension();
00331                 int kc = pKernel->getParameterDimension();
00332                 double k;
00333                 double A = 0.0;
00334                 double S = 0.0;
00335                 Array<double> a(kc);
00336                 Array<double> b(kc);
00337                 Array<double> der(kc);
00338                 derivative.resize(D, false);
00339 
00340                 a = 0.0;
00341                 b = 0.0;
00342                 double aCplus = 0.0;
00343                 double aCminus = 0.0;
00344                 double bCplus = 0.0;
00345                 double bCminus = 0.0;
00346                 derivative = 0.0;
00347 
00348                 for (i=0; i<T; i++)
00349                 {
00350                         for (j=0; j<i; j++)
00351                         {
00352                                 k = pKernel->evalDerivative(input[i], input[j], der);
00353                                 if (target(i) > 0.0 && target(j) > 0.0) mult = amult = 2.0 * mult_pp;
00354                                 else if (target(i) < 0.0 && target(j) < 0.0) mult = amult = 2.0 * mult_nn;
00355                                 else { mult = -2.0; amult = 2.0; }
00356 
00357                                 for (d=0; d<kc; d++)
00358                                 {
00359                                         a(d) += mult * der(d);
00360                                         b(d) += amult * k * der(d);
00361                                 }
00362                                 A += mult * k;
00363                                 S += amult * k * k;
00364                         }
00365                         k = pKernel->evalDerivative(input[i], input[i], der);
00366                         if (norm2)
00367                         {
00368                                 if (target(i) > 0.0)
00369                                 {
00370                                         double invC = 1.0 / pCSVM->get_Cplus();
00371                                         k += invC;
00372                                         aCplus -= mult_pp * invC * invC;
00373                                         bCplus -= mult_pp * k * invC * invC;
00374                                 }
00375                                 else
00376                                 {
00377                                         double invC = 1.0 / pCSVM->get_Cminus();
00378                                         k += invC;
00379                                         aCminus -= mult_nn * invC * invC;
00380                                         bCminus -= mult_nn * k * invC * invC;
00381                                 }
00382                         }
00383                         if (target(i) > 0.0) mult = mult_pp;
00384                         else mult = mult_nn;
00385                         for (d=0; d<kc; d++)
00386                         {
00387                                 a(d) += mult * der(d);
00388                                 b(d) += mult * k * der(d);
00389                         }
00390                         A += mult * k;
00391                         S += mult * k * k;
00392                 }
00393 
00394                 double N = 2.0 * sqrt(((double)n) * ((double)p) * S);
00395                 if (norm2)
00396                 {
00397                         double cr = pCSVM->getCRatio();
00398                         derivative(0) = (A * (bCplus + bCminus / cr) / S - (aCplus + aCminus / cr)) / N;
00399                         for (d=0; d<kc; d++)
00400                         {
00401                                 derivative(d + 1) = (A * b(d) / S - a(d)) / N;
00402                         }
00403                 }
00404                 else
00405                 {
00406                         for (d=0; d<kc; d++)
00407                         {
00408                                 derivative(d) = (A * b(d) / S - a(d)) / N;
00409                         }
00410                 }
00411 
00412                 return -A / N;
00413         }
00414 };
